entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn is a person who can reach no higher than Hagrid's elbow. He pats it all the same and says a few words at Aragog's funeral.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry thinks that Slughorn must have got a lot of good-quality venom from Aragog.

entities.name: aragog
entities.description: Aragog is an arachnid who has been described as the king of arachnids. He has long and faithful friendships with those who knew him.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid cries harder than ever at Aragog's funeral and praises Slughorn's eulogy.

entities.name: agrago's descendants
entities.description: Aragog's many-eyed descendants are expected to flourish.

relationships.description: Slughorn gives a eulogy for Aragog at his funeral.
Hagrid praises Slughorn's eulogy for Aragog.
